16%......So I feel kinda like a Whore right now

my thanksgiving was awesome....

A girl who just got her license crashed into my car. Now my auto looks like an acordion and I feel like everytime I drive it the bumper might fall off.

Yay, I'm never going to Valpo again

I had a photoshoot last night, it was different. My makeup artist put me in black eye makeup that seemed like it went out to me ears and then bright cherry lipstick and teezed my hair so I was like totally eighties. Then for my swimwear  pictures, Kristin had the honors of spraying me down with olive oil and soaking my hair. The pics....all I gotta say is they better be damn good. I looked like the girl, the freaky one, from The Ring. Scary! 

One other point, I know of someone who drops my name to get into parties. I would really like that to stop because you're making yourself look like an idiot and making me look as if I actually know you. It's really just not all that cool yo. So, If you're at a frat and you go..."But I know holly coatsolonia" it's not gonna do you any good if I'm not with you. Duh

Problem of my life at the moment:

I was encountered by my boss at Dick's and was chosen (out of all apparel) to go to a Columbia Expo in Cincinnati with her. Learning about fabrication and price techniques and stuff like that. I was so excited cause expo=free stuff and indiana=cold and columbia=warm stuff. plus being recognized is a plus. 

Today I got a call from a recruiter from Sears Corporate and was asked to be interviewed for an internship this summer because'the recruiter was impressed by my charisma and work history'....yeah, I WAS excited until that day looked familiar, oh wait, yeah I'm gonna be in Cincinnati living it up in ear muffs GODDAMNIT. So I just wrote a pity e-mail to the recruiter and explained my situation(minus the fasination in free stuff)....Please please please give me another chance!!!!!!

Um, lets see...Ran out of gas on Tuesday in front of KDR, Had a shoot on wednesday(that went very well), missed my tanning appt. thurday, went to an all frosh party on friday(and bought some massively awesome yellow stilletto pumps that I showed off), saturday Randy came down and I almost got arrested at a party(that was real cool), and yeah.....this week, not so much fun...

ok, that is all....bye now
I LOVE DOLLY AND SHE IS COMING TO CHICAGO OCTOBER 28TH!!!!!!!

Sometimes, when I'm calm and free....I pop in Alison Krauss and drink Tazo tea(Flavor=calm) and just re-lax.

I'm in that mood right now doing that

You should try it sometime. She has a gorgeous voice....and I know it's bluegrass but it just feels like you're way way up in the mountains all alone and peaceful

Does anyone ever remember while being a kid, thinking of 2000 seemes soooooo extremely far away or even thinking about getting your lisence? and it's 2005/2006 school year. I probably have gotten a headache when I was 10 thinking about 2005. 

So, the year has started...and it's busier then ever. With 18 credit hours in classes that I would have looked at my courses my frosh yr and been like....ewww....don't want that....and working(yeah, I got a job at Dicks as their Visual Merchandiser) and Alpha Kappa Psi and My initial laziness....things are getting hectic.

I talked to my Grandma on Sunday and she told me about my birthday surprise...and how it's gonna have to be moved. Why you may ask? Possibly because it was planned for New Orleans. Yep....21 in New Orleans would be fab, but waterlogged, not so much. 

I think I'm alergic to my sheets. I have itchy ass bumps all over and have been (literally) bathing in wal-dryl....yeah i go to college can't afford the benadryl no more. wal-dryl could be from walmart OR walgreens....hmmm, which do you think i did? Pew.

Was gonna go to the pool today but it's nasty and cold(I'm wearing a green plushy turtlenech that I wore to Valpo football games....with khaki shorts cause I couldn't do the whole winter look....and because I have no clean pants...i wore a skirt to my 8:30 and 3tanks and a sweater that was dirty and my hair nastass cause i woke up late and my friends said i looked cute....so not what i was going for)

You hear about Britney yellin at the 13 yr old kid? I would have too if some kid was bashin my sister.....actually, i have....you go Britney. Don't let people bash.

Keith Urban makes my head sweat....Ben Affleck is my head sweat and Matt Damon is my pit sweat.
Angelina Jolie is gorgeous.....I wish I could look like that minus the weird voodoo stuff. Brad Pitt ain't too bad either.

Backstreet Boys are back

What is this world coming to?

Oh, and I love Purdue 
if this was the equation:
Purdue-(Finals week+Monday though Thursday+Sorority Bitches+COLD INDIANA FREAKWEATHER+Smellyness+Foreigners+CSR331+COM256)=MY love for Purdue University

It's not PU for no reason guys....it is PUish on occassion when that wind is ablowin you get a strong whiff of ugness, pure ugness.

Oh Purdue, What I will be like without you.....I know one thing for sure, I won't have a rough burning of sulfer in my big noseamos.

Oh and also, I'm into putting lipgloss on my eyes because it gives them a super sheek look w/ a glossover....but I tell ya what, They get stuck alot...and it might look freaky(I don't know). Maybe I'll get a pic of my stuck eyes and use that as my LJ pic. That would be hot.

And i caught a roomie charging me and my other roomie extra in bills. AND WE CAUGHT HER AND SHE'S GOING TO HELL FOR IT.

That is all

1. Total Volume of music files on my computer:
1614

2.Last CD I bought:
Oh geez, no makin fun of me....I bought.. Alison Krauss...Lonely goes Both Ways. It's a great cd...if you like bluegrass

3.Last song I listened to before doing this meme:
Almost-Bowling for Soup

- I don't know who else....yay

Here's a new pic for you all to enjoy. 

I was licking Angie
Very Very Intoxicated

If you couldn't already tell

Guys, Sometimes my parents can be so unbelievably cruel. 

Here's looking to summer at my dad's house.

So, I just had a natural high when I shook the hand of the Vice President of BMW America.
And he said My name too.

So, I can't wait for summer. You guys prob heard of my small delema. I took a job w/ Circuit City on Friday. It's a good job too lots of perks. But I got a call Monday from Nordstroms(MY FAVORITE STORE, I applied there like in december and gave up because of no call back) And they wanted a follow up and potential hire for the summer in Baltimore. I SAID NO TO NORDSTROMS. OMG
And then a bank in Chesterton called me yesterday cause they want me to work for them but I said no.

This sucks....lesson=Don't sell yourself short too soon.

So....I met the Vice of BMW...this is the best part of my week so I called my mom and told her he gave me a BMW and she didn't believe me...

She knows me too well, it sucks...I just wanna have a little fun!

Oh, and download this song I'm listening to, it is funny and haha

I would like to dedicate this entry to Miss Julie Weiss. Your words about the Pope were wonderful and I'm so glad you said what you did because it truly touched me.
He was a great man and he's now at the beginning of the rest of his life. A life that he has believed in for all these years.

This weekend was wonderful and the weather is even better. Lets hope it will last.

My moms birthday was yesterday...39 to be exact. And I forgot....but she dosen't know that cause she was in Chicago and she never answers her cell, so i'm gonna play it off. 

Ok, I'm out....I love Randy Thomas :)

Hey guys, I see you all got home from the Spring Breaker alive and thumpin so hey hey HOOHRAHRAH.

Mine was good for the most part...relaxing and shoppin. The kicker I suppose came when I went out to a bar with my Uncle or Brother Tony(Whatever you feel most comfortable with) and got wasted and had to hide the worst hangover from nana and had to fly home. Don't drink night before an early flight....holy cow. It sucked. And then my mom made fun of me and called me an drunk. But hey, it's good. 
Oh, and I have a NEW Aunt Olga flown directly in from RUSSIA....cept we Coatso's pronounce it ULGA cause we be cool like that.

And, My Apt. flooded over the break....so thats what me and the roomies have been doin allday.....cause we came home to a wreck. I think I would have handled getting robbed better cause mgmt really destroyed this place. Like....Bottoms Up Bitch.

Hey Hey and Easter is Sunday. Who's be going home and whos be goin to drinky drink? Oh, and pardon my english....I've been in Maryland all week so BITE ME HOLERS....

Oh, and I hope no one got Pounced on...cause I would beat some Spring Breakers butt for whoever or whatever pounced on my LJ Buddy.

Yeah....I'm back
Holl

So I've been tanning to be prepared for my SB in MD (not counting the fact that they had school cancelled on tues because of snow) but anyways, those of you who know....
when I start something I go crazy
And....I guess I've been tanning too much cause I have developed these little dots on my chest and I itch a like a mothafucka.

what it takes to be beautiful

it sucks

So Like, I was reading previous entries and it came across to me that I'm an obsessive wacko for Ben Folds. So to all of you who think that....Can I take you back to a time when I was obsessed with

So all of you, I think that I'm increasing my good music rating. So, Rock On Ben!

So, Today was the first time in like a week and a half that I made my 9:00 class.
Still workin on getting to that 7:30am one though.
7:30 classes
In college
Is BULLSHIT

Speaking from a pro....I just can't wake up that early while in school
It's almost IMPOSSIBLE.

Anyways, I'm thinking of following in Stella and Doug and soooo many others footsteps and moving my puny white ass over to Zanga...Xanga. Wow Holly, SPELL it right at least
I need advice. Should I be a trader and go....or should I stay.
If I go, y'all are comin with me cause I couldn't imagine not living everyday without you....Casha, Angie, Rachel, Syd, and All you other wonderfulls.

And the OC is on tonight...(just thought I might be a pal and remind you of it).
Ok, Classe time.....
Holl


OHHHHH and I dyed my hair like a olive brown(I came up with the color...Randy said that Olive is 'green' but I must protest that my hair is not green it just has an olive hue)
No blond in it at alllllllll anymore.

So....I've been thinkin about kids names. All my pals from VHS will know the list I had:
Deanie
Beanie
Zuzu

But, the BF dosen't like em...at all...so here is my new list:
Shane
MAXIMUS!!! Haha, it's growing on him I think
Jake
Armon

Natalie

Hehehe, I'm a nut. 
Spring Break....WHERE ARE YOU HIDING!?!?!

Valpo this weekend and I'm gonna eat a ton and get fat and then it will be funny cause I'll HAVE to work out then.
Elections tonight, cross yo fingers!

So, It's Valentine's Day....the worse day of the year. I have a great boyfriend but he's up in Valpo and I'm here. So, this day remains the same crappy day as always

So, looks like I might be going up to Valpo this weekend to do my taxes and maybe a little ass whoopin. Family problems therefore, I decided:

Going to Baltimore for Spring Break. 
Gotta get away
Shop alittle
wait, I lied
a lot

and then I'll be happy again.

Tomorrow is elections. I'm running for pledge class president for AKPsi. Should be fun.

And, shoutout to Randy for making my weekend great. I love you so much and can't wait to see you in a few.

Holls

In case you didn't know

Anh, I have no food in this place but soup, angel hair, 1 bag of popcorn, and 1/2 box of special K, oh and 3 boxes of blueberry muffin mix

Depressing

And you ask why I listen to Ben? Because I do. Keeps me from drinking and destroying my liver but I do that already but with Ben I do it more in a slower process

Ok, 
Bye

There's really not just one reason to why I do....
He's my support and my love and I have complete admiration for him.

I just thought you all should know

Hope semester is going well for you all! Don't you just HATE indiana though? If Purdue was like say in....St. Thomas, I would be one happy camper...eh?

This entry is dedicated to those of you who always made fun of me for my organization and my planners and calenders and all that crap....

BECAUSE I SUCK

So this is how it happened....I was talking to Randy last night about a small difficulty we've been having....but thats not a big deal, So I go to bed and set 5 alarms because I had a CS final this morning at 8AM.....and To my disbelief I woke up at noon without the feeling of being done with my exams because I DIDN'T TAKE IT.

So I frantically run out of my room....to Jackie and Freakin about how I missed MY FINAL EXAM....and I called Eric King and he's a flyin fuck(ERIC KING=FLYIN FUCK), let me tell ya and somehow I got a time tomorrow morning to take it but with a small deduction of 25%.

So, for those of you who I used to tell of how organized and on top of it I am, please, I am allowing you to tell me to KISS MY ASS. Please, repeat after me, HOLLY COATSOLONIA, KISS MY FUCKIN ASS YOU HOE.

Feel better? I do a bit....thanks

Last night was a good time, hanging out with old friends that I haven't seen in a while. I ended up going to bed at 5am but i woke up at 9am....i think out of nervousness that my dad would walk in on me hung over or worse....makeup not done. Haha, Just jokin....but it is an ugly sight.

I really want a potato right now, but I just don't feel like doing it. Wouldn't it be great if potatoes came like precooked and all? I dunno....where is my head?

What a boring entry, I apologize. Just not alot of stuff is happenin over on this neck of the woods...except that Hannah thinks that I have an ugly name, but I can say that I'm a Bush. Holly=Bush? Yeah, it took me a while. Sad that my 13 yr old sister outsmarts me at times.

Man, I really want a potato. Wisconsin is going down....I hope. I have faith in my Boilermakers, but I am not gonna get myself all wound up just incase something bad happens. Oh, and those on campus, just be aware that my dad is here and the Sydney and the Hannah and the Dominator(2nd place Middle School Conference XC! We're gonna Nancy Kerrigan the 1st place Portage kid before next season, Domo will be become champion again haha)....please don't cause a ruckus. Don't wanna have that.

I gotta go get ready or do something.

Holls

Wow, it's been awhile...a long while. Life is pretty good, my friends are the absolute best, my grades are good and I'm pretty healthy due to my salsa workouts and pilates ab work.

Jackie and Rachael are great roommates. We understand eachothers boundries and I like that alot. It's so far so good. It really a pretty nice place all in all.....once we decorated and got stuff together. At first I was in all aw....in a bad way. Haha, but thankfully it got it's class together.

Tonight I'm gonna be Paul's dance partner for the Delta Sigs retro rocker. I'm getting excited the closer the time comes. We are doing good, we broke up over the summer but thankfully we're still the best of friends and we do everything together.

October Break can't come too soon....I'm desperately waiting to go home...don't ask why....alot of things combined together.

Ok, I'm out....haha, sorry about this ridiculous entry I just felt as if I should catch you all up somewhat before I start bitching about my life.

Love ya and See ya soon

Me

Hey everyone, I am very sorry I haven't been around much lately.

I chopped all my hair off...

Sadly to say...that is the most interesting part of my life right now.

The death of Ronald Reagan AKA to Jackie "Regan DeSalme" hahaha Jack.....has been a troubling part of my week. Everyone says that he was 93 and blah blah blah, but it really gets me when you think about how great of a man he really was. His successor wasn't his horse, the Russians, his family or even a cancer....it was his own mind and the loss of all the great ideas ond memories that mind had. All lost to  himself but remebered through the people who loved him most.
How terrifyingly sad yet how bittersweet his parting from us was. 

I pray that our generation makes a man like him pull to the surface like oil and water. He was the last of the times...of a time that I should have been a part of but so otherwise blessed to have knowledge of. The men who were like Ronald Reagan to me are 2 of my biggest idols...My Grandpa Kubiak and John Wayne. 

I know my sisters and my mom agrees with me. They had the biggest hearts yet the most boyish sence of political matters. How I wish I could be of their liking and not a day passes in which I don't pray for them and pray formyself to have the wisdom and courage of these brave individuals who led our country into hope and success.


In other news...My birthday is on Saturday. I'm gonna be 19. 
Wow
